alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Monroe; Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON... SOUTHEASTERN MONROE AND ONTARIO COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Conesus to Honeoye to near Kendaia. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, Avon, Victor, Honeoye Falls, Conesus, Bristol, Lima, Clifton Springs, Phelps, Bloomfield, Rushville, Hemlock, Honeoye, Farmington, Mendon, Gorham, East Bloomfield, Rush, and West Bloomfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 8 and 11. Interstate 90 between exits 42 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
